website_summaries.verdict: Includes the basic features of the more expensive models at an affordable price.
pros: Yellow light increases in brightness before your set alarm for gentle waking
Can be used as a lamp
Features 2 natural sounds or FM radio for the alarm
cons: Clock display is a little too bright

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the light is nice, but it has too many flaws
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the light that this clock puts out, but it has many issues. 1) Too lightweight -- I have knocked it over many times. 2) When it becomes unplugged, the time is erased because there is no internal battery 3) The buttons have no indentations and cannot be found by feel in the dark 4) Related to the last problem, to find the light switch, you must look directly into the light which is hard on the eyes 5) The FM tuner is not very strong Overall, I would not purchase this again. It's a good light, but it's awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stairs

customer_reviews.title: It’s everything it’s cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I’m a chronic oversleeper, and alarms used to fill me with despair and hatred for the world. This thing is a gentle and kind beacon of hope in the morning. The light fades up, and the birds start chirping, and it’s time to greet the day! Can’t wait to see what it does for me in the Seattle winter. It’s not a miracle. It obviously works best when you’ve had enough sleep in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Micol C.

customer_reviews.title: I love waking up with the sun during the spring and ...
customer_reviews.text: Might sound weird, but completely changed my life this winter. I love waking up with the sun during the spring and summer and have a hard time with the morning darkness in the winter. Was so nice to wake up to a softly lit room. And the bird sounds are great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best used as a glorified and overpriced reading light
customer_reviews.text: Claims to “fill the room with light” and fails miserably. Even at the brightest setting, the light is simply too small to be effective. Unless your face happens to be 4 inches from it, it will go completely unnoticed. If anything, it only serves to make my room seem darker in contrast, which in turn makes me sleepier. The numerals on the clock are too bright even on the dimmest setting (there is no way to turn them off), and any time it gets accidentally unplugged or there is a power failure, you need to reset the entire thing. There is no battery option. I wish I had returned it. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: bobulated

customer_reviews.title: Always have a Back Up Plan
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt wake me up so I still have to have the alarm but does make me feel better to have light in the room when I wake up and the sound of the birds is one of my favorite sounds and makes me feel good. Easy to use too. I would recommend this product but always have a back up for waking up. Updated 09-20-18. Well its back in the box and in the garage sale pile. I enjoyed the bird sounds but I got use to the light and birds and it didnt wake me up. It became to much to set everynight and I got tired of messing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Beauman

customer_reviews.title: The Radio Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The radio is absolutely terrible. The volume cuts in and out. Comes with a crappy little wire antenna that doesn't help much. I guess no antenna can make up for a crappy radio. I bought Philips instead of a cheaper brand to avoid product performance issues. For this price point, I expected an FM radio to be at least as good as a five dollar Walmart special but that is not the case. Gets two stars because the light works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed waking up with the light
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed waking up with the light, it really did work. However, I could never figure out how to snooze" with the touch feature. It was difficult to use with no actual buttons. I cannot use this clock anymore after my electricity went out and messed up the clock somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Kezyram

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed the nature sounds option as well as the light
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the nature sounds option as well as the light, however the product barely lasted longer than its 90 day warranty before dying. Most expensive and short lived clock ever. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over your phone!
customer_reviews.text: It took a week or two for me to adjust to it, but now I’m hooked. I find myself waking I’m up at the same time, even when I’m out of town for a day or two without the clock. Plus, I’m in a better mood in the AM (coming from NOT a morning person). The “sunrise” slowly takes place over 30 minutes, which at first I found annoying. However, after a week, I actually preferred it. Only downside is that there are no backup batteries. We frequently lose power at our house, and are forced to reset the clock every time. Other than that, it’s a significant improvement over the alarm clock on my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: would love it more if it had a back up for power outages I have been getting a trouble code when I try to shut off (silence the birds after the alarm goes off) and the cycle repeats. I eventually unplug the unit. There is no mention of this code in the manual, my power cord was still in tact when it happened. Unfortunately, after the first time it was a few weeks before it happened again and now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: erin lucrisia

customer_reviews.title: Makes mornings easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock! I live in Minnesota and the winters get dark and cold very quickly so getting out of my toasty bed in the morning is sometimes a struggle. This clock has made that easier; I am much more alert waking up to this alarm than any others! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a year.
customer_reviews.text: Randomly turns on in the middle of the night after a few months of use, as others have experienced. Poor quality controls.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to wake without being startled, this is the product. I do wish I could have more choices than birds or waves; maybe the next model. However, to start my day, waking as if the sun gently stroked my eyelids, is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: W. D

customer_reviews.title: It's the cheapest Philips with sounds/radio
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. I am disappointed that you have to spend this much to get two nature sounds to make up to. Spoiler, they are both birds. Your other choices are radio or beeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful alarm clock. I no longer wake up with my cell phone alarm annoyed by the loud warning to wake up! The light that turns on gradually and the radio option are perfect for waking up without a jolt.
customer_reviews.author: March91306

customer_reviews.title: No Battery Backup.  All programming is lost.
customer_reviews.text: Also, it is so dumb that you have to look into the light to find/push a button. Falls over constantly, which can result in plug coming out of wall, and then you have to program it again. Bad design for the high price
customer_reviews.author: M. Tanous

customer_reviews.title: I like it ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it ok, but there are a few fatal flaws for me: -I sleep like the dead, and even with the light, this guy isn't loud enough to wake me up most days. I always set backup alarms on my iPhone. -The numbers are too bright at night for my comfort. I mostly use this as a supplement to other alarms. The other alarm wakes me up, and this clock greets me with a pleasant light and the morning news on the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite way to wake up
customer_reviews.text: I like the gradual light in the morning and the radio setting. It’s so much better than a straight alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over six months still happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband wanted. It suits his needs. Easy set up, it’s not hard to figure out. He’s had it for over six months now and still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to set up though it does look great
customer_reviews.text: This may work like a charm -- I'll never know. It was so complicated to set up and the instructions were so poor that I returned it. The company gave me a prompt refund,without any fuss, and for that I thank them. I also really liked the looks of the light and was disappointed that I couldn't use it. But -- life is too short to spend more than 10 minutes puzzling over confusing instructions for what is basically a light bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Libby Koponen

customer_reviews.title: Not gradual light, cheap sounds
customer_reviews.text: I'd hoped I'd get used to it for the price (didn't want to spend $80+ for one of these light alarms), but this alarm's light doesn't increase gradually, but in steps. I always wake up when it first comes on and then again at every successive increase. It's really annoyingly jarring. Also: the sounds are high-pitched and cheap and run in very short loops that don't start at a low volume: also jarring. Sad I kept too long to return hoping I'd get used to it so I didn't have to pay double for a nicer light alarm clock. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Cassiopeia

customer_reviews.title: I get up for my workouts now
customer_reviews.text: I have to wake up at 5 in order to get a workout before work. Before I got this clock I struggled to consitantly get out of bed. I don't wake up feeling refreshed like some say but the light being on keeps me from falling back asleep. I will lay there and listen to the radio alarm with the bright light on for a few minutes as my body wakes up. I would and do recommend for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Missing important features
customer_reviews.text: Does its job, but I wish I would have done a little more research and bought the more expensive one. This does not update for daylight savings time, does not have a "weekend" mode, and no battery backup if you lose power or it gets unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Unfortunately no memory on the device, which means every time the power goes out, or its unplugged is has to be reprogrammed. All in all its been great. My wake up schedule has been greatly improved
customer_reviews.author: Dawie de Villiers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This showed up without all the parts. There wasn’t even a plug. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Paula H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to Gently Wake Up
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I usually awake by the "rising sun" of the clock before the radio alarm comes on. It is gentle way to awaken. Even though I can still be annoyed when woken from sleep, this is gently annoying. Definitely worth the additional cost from a "normal" alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Baillie

customer_reviews.title: Subtle alarm
customer_reviews.text: Very subtle bird chirps with the owl hoots, the clock lights up when the alarm goes off and the brightness is adjustable, I also liked the 24 hour time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Babila

customer_reviews.title: Great wake up companion
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The touch interface is slick and radio works like a charm. The alarm sound is a bit low for the natural bird sounds though. Otherwise it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Shanil K

customer_reviews.title: I wake up calm, relaxed, and refreshed
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this clock for a short time, but so far so good. I have noticed such a difference in my mood when I wake up with this clock. The gentleness of the light and the bird sounds are awesome. I like not being jolted awake by a radio or the beeping of my phone. I would totally recommend this product to anyone, especially those with SAD. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 2 years, but it has broken just beyond the warranty! Bummed out, as it was an expensive clock to only last, and seems like it was built to last just beyond the warranty. It was a good clock, and wish I could have a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Brezak

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! I used to have a very hard time ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I used to have a very hard time waking up in a dark room, but now I wake up even before the birds start chirping. It is perfect for me. The read out is not too bright as it can be turned very low. It is light, but I touch it gently once a day to turn it off, that's it. My power has not gone off since I received it so re-setting has not been a problem. Initial setting was simple as I did not need instructions so am not worried about setting it again if the power goes off, which may happen once a year. I definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melsylla

customer_reviews.title: Okay Clock
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good alarm clock but with some flaws. No ability to set alarm clock for Monday thru Friday so you have to make sure you turn the alarm on and off everyday. Hitting the snooze button is not that responsive so I have to whack it pretty hard in the morning. The button to turn the alarm off is on the front of the clock so you knock the clock over often when trying to turn it off because the clock is so light. I like the clock overall, but for the price I was a little disappointed. Probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase. It is such a big difference in ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It is such a big difference in the morning to wake up to these peaceful sounds and sunlight every day. I am so happy I have this!
customer_reviews.author: FaithHopeLove

customer_reviews.title: but I like the wake-up light
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but I like the wake-up light. It could really use backup batteries though in case of a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Drewkas

customer_reviews.title: Needs better controls and a weighted base.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. The lighted wake up was effective but the controls aren’t user friendly and it gets knocked over way to easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately it does not come with a battery for when ...
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately it does not come with a battery for when there are power cuts to simply accidentally disconnect it, the stored information is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: Worked as promised, but does not make it easier for me to wake up. The light is to direct in my face.
customer_reviews.author: robin buckner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, mornings without the jarring alarm tone are great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Seidler

customer_reviews.title: Rise and shine.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this alarm clock one time but I have already noticed a huge difference. I’ve always used my iPhone as an alarm and decided I wanted to get a regular alarm clock so I could leave my phone in another room to try to get some better sleep. I’ve never been a morning person and would almost never get up the first time my alarm went off. I always felt tired and never ready for the day. Well today I woke up feeling amazing. When the alarm went off it felt like I had been awake for awhile already and didn’t feel tired. I’m really looking forward to this alarm clock in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The radio alarm sound can be turned to low to utilise only the wake up light feature which is great. Overall it was well worth m
customer_reviews.text: It worked exactly as advertised. The radio alarm sound can be turned to low to utilise only the wake up light feature which is great. Overall it was well worth money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to use and turn off when the alarm goes off. Not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oh

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it, maybe their newer version is better
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly, ostensibly should be very simple but many features just don't work well , for instance need to adjust every time the light level for the light alarm , impossible to set for light alarm only without sound (must have sound set as well), not clear how to stop the light in the morning etc etc
customer_reviews.author: Amir Cohen

customer_reviews.title: cost too much
customer_reviews.text: To difficult to set up and change to different times
customer_reviews.author: Daniel John Baur

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner, as she tends to snooze her alarm a lot. This seems to have helped with that a lot! I also tend to wake up more refreshed, since her alarm goes off before mine. Honestly, when she doesn't have to work early and I wake up to just my regular alarm, I find it to be a much more jarring experience. I guess we're both reaping the benefits! The alarm sounds are all bird chirps and nature sounds, and they gradually increase in volume, easing you into wakefulness. It's pretty rad!
customer_reviews.author: Transmission3000

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Waking up from the light is so much more peaceful than being jolted awake by loud music.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Gradual Wake Up--Even in the Darkest Days of Winter
customer_reviews.text: Before this alarm clock, I often struggled to wake up around 6 am when it's pitch black outside and/or often woke up late. Now, my body gradually wakes up with the simulated sunrise and I'm ready to get out of bed when the birds start chirping (the alarm sound that also gradually gets louder). If you're already getting 8 hours of sleep but still have trouble waking up without sunlight, I highly recommend this alarm clock. It's helped me tremendously. There are a few drawbacks in design, but none of those interfere with the function for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T

customer_reviews.title: Cons outweigh pros.
customer_reviews.text: The clock is indeed far too bright even at lowest setting and impossible to resolve due to the design. Turning the alarm off in the morning involves staring directly into the light while trying to find a faint pencil-eraser sized spot on a smooth touch panel. It's also really expensive for what you get. It may have to go back, I like it even less after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Gia V

customer_reviews.title: Nice alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: This alarm clock is SO much better to wake up to than music or buzzing (you can also wake up to radio with this if you want). I love the light and the chirping birds, I find that I wake up much better with the light than my old alarm. The light and the alarm display light is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Klik

customer_reviews.title: This alarm works like it is advertised but just was not the ticket ...
customer_reviews.text: This alarm works like it is advertised but just was not the ticket for my son or my husband. If I needed an alarm this would be my choice but I have trained myself to wake u without one. My husband found the light was not enough to wake him up gradually and found the birds slightly annoying. My son thought it was too big for his nightstand. I suggest you try and see for yourself, it really is an excellent product for the right person.
customer_reviews.author: Geecee

customer_reviews.title: I love waking up to the light of this alarm and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love waking up to the light of this alarm and the soothing nature sounds. It is far better than a typical alarm clock. However, in order to turn the alarm off you need to stare straight into the light, it does effectively wake one up, but sort of defeats the notion of a gentle awaking. The "off button" is a tiny little thing and I'm blinded every morning trying to find it! Amazingly, this still gets it a "3" because it's better than my iPhone playing a bagpipe version of a bolero.
customer_reviews.author: Sojourn London

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: disappointed ...does not help me and radio has lousy tone It is difficult to change settings and necessary to reset everything if a momentary power loss is experienced I would like to return it
customer_reviews.author: P E Lieb

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to wake up to a room full of light
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews note, the light from the clock display is glaringly bright at night. I went ahead and taped some thick paper over the middle section. As for the functioning of the light in terms of an alarm, I'd say it functions well, but it's not a miracle. It's nice to wake up to a room full of light, but I have definitely slept through it and need a second, traditional alarm across the room as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and love it. The light feature is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for quite some time now, and love it. The light feature is perfect, especially for those dreary winter mornings when it is more difficult to "rise and shine." The choice of nature sounds and radio is nice, and it is very easy to change your settings as needed. Its smaller size is just right for my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so much better than a traditional alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than a traditional alarm clock. I haven't gotten to use it while working yet, as it's summer and I'm a teacher, but from the times I've used it so far this summer I think it will make waking up a whole lot easier! It has so many functions, it was fun customizing it!

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the buttons are a pain to use and ...

customer_reviews.author: Fish Z.

customer_reviews.title: This light really works! I was a little skeptical ...
customer_reviews.text: This light really works! I was a little skeptical about the sunrise simulation but it actually wakes me up each morning without any alarm. I still can't believe that for this price that the clock does not have an internal battery.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Brady

customer_reviews.title: Wake up refreshed!
customer_reviews.text: I am definirty attached to the light outside. I start waking up later and later in the darker winter month. This helps me wake up in the morning. I wish it had colored light that would feel a bit more normal in the morning and it’s missing battery backup. It works better than some cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: i can not believe i have been lliving without this ...
customer_reviews.text: i can not believe i have been lliving without this my whole life. This will change the way you wake up in the morning, I tmight be hard to believe since its only a $64 clock. I wake up refreshed and ready for work. Just try it and see.
customer_reviews.author: ali7up

customer_reviews.title: It's great for a night time reading light
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a night time reading light, and the light is really subtle, the alarm takes a bit to get used to though, I'm still not sure I love it, but it beats an annoying alarm, just doesn't always do the job!
customer_reviews.author: SchwaW

customer_reviews.title: ... advertised - I found myself waking up much more easily even at early hours
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised - I found myself waking up much more easily even at early hours. The light itself is powerful enough to use as your go-to bedside light (for example, for reading). This is one you should read the manual for, since the controls/interface may be different from alarm clocks you are used to. (Functionality hasn't been sacrificed for style, but I did sort of miss physical buttons.) Once you know the controls, however, the Philips Wake-Up Light is very easy to use, it does what it says it does, and its elegant design will look good in many bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kerin D Ogg

customer_reviews.title: Mornings are less awful.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a morning person. But I tilt my face to this thing as it slowly lights up, and by the time I'm supposed to be getting up, my eyes both work at the same time, and I'm capable of very short sentences.
customer_reviews.author: K T Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: The light portion of this alarm alone is not enough to wake me up, as it only illuminates a corner of my bedroom, not the entire room. However, it does seem to bring me out of deeper sleep, so it is significantly easier to wake up when the sound function of the alarm goes off. Would be a better product if the light lit up the entire room. As others have mentioned, it is very lightweight, but I have not had any issues with durability so far. Buttons are a bit small and hard to hit in a squinty-eyed, half asleep state, but overall I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is really working! I wake up with the light a few minutes before the alarm goes off. Not giving it a 5 because the time seems to always be a minute or two behind, no matter how many times I set the time right. Why isn't it atomic time to start with?
customer_reviews.author: Tango And CC

customer_reviews.title: This works great and I personally have not had any technical glitches ...

And it's also tricky to make sure the alarm is actually set. What I like best is the chirping bird sound. I haven't used the radio yet because I didn't need another radio in the bedroom. I actually considered returning the clock because of all the difficulties, but am keeping it just for the bird sound alarm
customer_reviews.author: Nick1010

It is nice having an adjustable nightlight and radio but knowing what I know now I would not have bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Broke my snooze habit.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a less disappointing way to wake up. I had a 30 minute snooze period built into my waking routine, which occassionally lead to me oversleeping. This light alarm gently wakes me up so I do not feel compelled to snooze.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool clock and I loved the look of it on my nightstand. But I was disappointed that it didn't have a feature to slowly start turning on the light before the alarm went on as other wake-up light clocks do. If it did have the feature, I couldn't figure it out. Also, the alarm sounds are limited. The two nature sounds are nice, but not loud enough to wake me up (I wear earplugs because my husband sometimes snores). There's no traditional alarm sound. Finally, when the alarm sounds, it's almost impossible to figure out which part of the touch display to tap to turn off the alarm, particularly when one is bleary-eyed.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Prov

customer_reviews.title: Morning workouts, here I come.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this light. I credit it with my success following an exercise program. It's just so much less jarring to wake up gradually to the light and then to the sound of birds; I'm finally able to get out of bed on time again!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: No more harsh wake ups, no more dreading the alarm, and no more groggy mornings. I wake up peacefully and wide awake!
